definition: permanent/constant/fixed/usual/ordinary/rule (old)/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷟)

sentences.english: There are 16 star systems, and you get to fly 4 ships.
sentences.chinese: 遊戲包括16個恆星系，你可以駕駛4種不同的飛船。

sentences.english: Many faraway stellar systems can be observed through a space telescope.
sentences.chinese: 藉助太空望遠鏡可以觀察到許多離我們很遠的恆星系。
